StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @FirstName varchar(20), @LastName varchar(20), @MiddleName varchar(20), @SSN varchar(9), @Su.xID varchar(5), @LastEditBy varchar(15) ) AS BEGIN IF EXISTS(SELECT SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER FROM PERSON WHERE SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN) BEGIN SELECT PERSON_ID FROM PERSON WHERE SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[PERSON] ([SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER] ,[FIRST_NAME] ,[LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME] ,[LAST_NAME] ,[SUFFIX_CD] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE] ,[rowguid]) VALUES (@SSN ,@FirstName ,@MiddleName ,@LastName ,@Su.xID ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate() ,newid())
SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY()
END END
